description: Gets the site address of the specified site.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The ID or the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the site.

parameters.name: AddressType
parameters.description: The type of the address you request.

nested_items.name: AddressType
nested_items.description: The type of the address you receive.

nested_items.name: ContactPhoneNumber
nested_items.description: The phone number of the contact.

nested_items.name: AddressLine1
nested_items.description: The first line of the address.

nested_items.name: AddressLine2
nested_items.description: The second line of the address.

nested_items.name: AddressLine3
nested_items.description: The third line of the address.

nested_items.name: DistrictOrCounty
nested_items.description: The district or county for the address.

nested_items.name: PostalCode
nested_items.description: The postal code for the address.

nested_items.name: CountryCode
nested_items.description: The ISO-3166 two-letter country code for the address.
